response.original_title: Die Kriegszeit rund um St. Ruprecht/Raab
response.overview: What exactly happened in the community of St. Ruprecht/Raab during the war? What did the population have to struggle with - how active were they in National Socialism? And what does that concern us today? Michael Gernot Sumper from Rollsdorf researched these topics in many sources and interviewed over 20 contemporary witnesses around Etzersdorf, Rollsdorf, Unterfladnitz and St. Ruprecht. The result is a vivid documentary with interviews and many historical photos from this time.
response.title: Die Kriegszeit rund um St. Ruprecht/Raab
